name: Purple Fantasy Diary
description:
This fun and yummy match 3 puzzle game is sure to become your favorite!

Purple Fantasy Diary is a simple and fun game, meant for players who write a diary everyday, no stress. This game is all about YOU.

Game Features:

-Play puzzles for Free!
-Play whenever, wherever; even without network!
-Need some thinking to this game
-Play for fun, with real, honest challenge puzzles!
-Join thousands of other players!

Download Purple Fantasy Diary today!
